testcase.name: add wish list from product's heart icon on main page
testcase.system-out: Given user on main page and accept cookie...................................passed When user clicks randomly a product's heart icon on main page...............passed And user goes to wish list from "header" menu...............................passed Then clicked product should be in wish list.................................passed

testcase.name: add wish list from product's heart icon on all products page
testcase.system-out: Given user on main page and accept cookie...................................passed When user clicks all products and then clicks randomly a product's heart icon.passed And user goes to wish list from "footer" menu...............................passed Then clicked product should be in wish list.................................passed

testcase.name: add wish list from wish list link on display page
testcase.system-out: Given user on main page and accept cookie...................................passed When user clicks random product from all products page......................passed And user clicks add wish list link and goes to wish list from "display page".passed Then clicked product should be in wish list.................................passed

testcase.name: click heart icon and goes to wish list from "heartbeat" icon on all products page
testcase.system-out: Given user on main page and accept cookie...................................passed When user clicks all products and then clicks randomly a product's heart icon.passed And user goes to wish list from same product's "heartbeat" icon.............passed Then clicked product should be in wish list.................................passed

testcase.name: remove product from wish list
testcase.system-out: Given user on main page and accept cookie...................................passed When user clicks all products and then clicks randomly a product's heart icon.passed And user goes to wish list from "header" menu...............................passed And user remove all products from wish list.................................passed Then no product should be in wish list......................................passed

testcase.name: search keyword from search field on main page
testcase.system-out: Given user on main page and accept cookie...................................passed When user search "jean" header menu search field...........................passed Then result product's name should contain "jean"............................passed

testcase.name: search keyword from search field on all catagories page
testcase.system-out: Given user on main page and accept cookie...................................passed When user clicks all products and searches "T-Shirt" on header menu search field.passed Then result product's name should contain "T-Shirt".........................passed

testcase.name: search keyword from left-bottom search field on all catagories page
testcase.system-out: Given user on main page and accept cookie...................................passed When user clicks all products and searches "Sneakers" left bottom search field on all catagories page.passed Then result product's name should contain "Sneakers"........................passed

testcase.name: add same product two times to Comparison List
testcase.system-out: Given user on main page and accept cookie...................................passed When user clicks random 1 products from all products page and clicks add comparison list link.passed And user clicks same product from all products page and clicks add comparison list link.passed And user goes to comparison list page from header menu......................passed Then 1 product should be in comparison list.................................passed

testcase.name: add two products to Comparison List
testcase.system-out: Given user on main page and accept cookie...................................passed When user clicks random 2 products from all products page and clicks add comparison list link.passed And user goes to comparison list page from footer menu......................passed Then 2 product should be in comparison list.................................passed

testcase.name: remove all products from comparison list
testcase.system-out: Given user on main page and accept cookie...................................passed When user clicks random 3 products from all products page and clicks add comparison list link.passed And user goes to comparison list page from header menu......................passed And user remove all products from comparison list...........................passed Then no product result text should be visible...............................passed
